mapper.select:
select count(*) from payv2_buss_company_shop
and id = #{id}
and shop_key like CONCAT('%',#{shopKey},'%')
and company_id = #{companyId}
and shop_name like CONCAT('%',#{shopName},'%')
and shop_card like CONCAT('%',#{shopCard},'%')
and shop_range_province = #{shopRangeProvince}
and shop_range_city = #{shopRangeCity}
and lat = #{lat}
and lon = #{lon}
and shop_address like CONCAT('%',#{shopAddress},'%')
and shop_icon like CONCAT('%',#{shopIcon},'%')
and shop_background like CONCAT('%',#{shopBackground},'%')
and shop_desc like CONCAT('%',#{shopDesc},'%')
and shop_week_time like CONCAT('%',#{shopWeekTime},'%')
and shop_day_start_time like CONCAT('%',#{shopDayStartTime},'%')
and shop_day_end_time like CONCAT('%',#{shopDayEndTime},'%')
and shop_remarks like CONCAT('%',#{shopRemarks},'%')
and shop_per_ave_money like CONCAT('%',#{shopPerAveMoney},'%')
and shop_contacts like CONCAT('%',#{shopContacts},'%')
and shop_contacts_phone like CONCAT('%',#{shopContactsPhone},'%')
and shop_email like CONCAT('%',#{shopEmail},'%')
and pay_way_id = #{payWayId}
and code_way_id like CONCAT('%',#{codeWayId},'%')
and shop_status = #{shopStatus}
and shop_pass_reason like CONCAT('%',#{shopPassReason},'%')
and shop_two_code_url like CONCAT('%',#{shopTwoCodeUrl},'%')
and is_delete = #{isDelete}
and create_time >= str_to_date(#{createTimeBegin}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and create_time <= str_to_date(#{createTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and update_time >= str_to_date(#{updateTimeBegin}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and update_time <= str_to_date(#{updateTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert:
insert into payv2_buss_company_shop
id,
shop_key,
company_id,
shop_name,
shop_card,
shop_range_province,
shop_range_city,
lat,
lon,
shop_address,
shop_icon,
shop_background,
shop_desc,
shop_week_time,
shop_day_start_time,
shop_day_end_time,
shop_remarks,
shop_per_ave_money,
shop_contacts,
shop_contacts_phone,
shop_email,
pay_way_id,
code_way_id,
shop_status,
shop_pass_reason,
shop_two_code_url,
is_delete,
create_time,
update_time,
#{id},
#{shopKey},
#{companyId},
#{shopName},
#{shopCard},
#{shopRangeProvince},
#{shopRangeCity},
#{lat},
#{lon},
#{shopAddress},
#{shopIcon},
#{shopBackground},
#{shopDesc},
#{shopWeekTime},
#{shopDayStartTime},
#{shopDayEndTime},
#{shopRemarks},
#{shopPerAveMoney},
#{shopContacts},
#{shopContactsPhone},
#{shopEmail},
#{payWayId},
#{codeWayId},
#{shopStatus},
#{shopPassReason},
#{shopTwoCodeUrl},
#{isDelete},
#{createTime},
#{updateTime},
mapper.update:
update payv2_buss_company_shop
shop_key=#{shopKey},
company_id=#{companyId},
shop_name=#{shopName},
shop_card=#{shopCard},
shop_range_province=#{shopRangeProvince},
shop_range_city=#{shopRangeCity},
lat=#{lat},
lon=#{lon},
shop_address=#{shopAddress},
shop_icon=#{shopIcon},
shop_background=#{shopBackground},
shop_desc=#{shopDesc},
shop_week_time=#{shopWeekTime},
shop_day_start_time=#{shopDayStartTime},
shop_day_end_time=#{shopDayEndTime},
shop_remarks=#{shopRemarks},
shop_per_ave_money=#{shopPerAveMoney},
shop_contacts=#{shopContacts},
shop_contacts_phone=#{shopContactsPhone},
shop_email=#{shopEmail},
pay_way_id=#{payWayId},
code_way_id=#{codeWayId},
shop_status=#{shopStatus},
shop_pass_reason=#{shopPassReason},
shop_two_code_url=#{shopTwoCodeUrl},
is_delete=#{isDelete},
create_time=#{createTime},
update_time=#{updateTime},
and id=#{id}
